Name: Royal Election Candidate, Felt
Text: 【CONT】 If the number of other 《Magic》 or 《Weapon》 characters you have is three or more, this card gets +2000 power.
【AUTO】 When this card attacks, search your deck for up to one 《Magic》 or 《Weapon》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your stock, and shuffle your deck.

【AUTO】 [(2)] When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose one of your characters, and that character gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 This ability activates up to one time per turn. When damage dealt by this card is canceled, you may deal one damage to your opponent." (This damage may be canceled)

Name: Pink-Haired Maid, Ram
Text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at up to three cards from the top of your deck, choose up to one card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.

【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When a card named "Subaru Natsuki's Decoy Tactic" is placed on your climax area, if this card is on your center stage, choose up to two cards in your opponent's waiting room, return it to your opponent's deck, your opponent shuffles his or her deck, and this card gets +3000 power until end of turn.
【AUTO】 [(2) Put a card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, deal one damage to your opponent. (This damage may be canceled)

Name: Cute Girl, Beatrice
Text: 【CONT】 If all of your characters are 《Magic》 or 《Weapon》, this card gets +2000 power.
【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room.

【AUTO】 Memory [(1)] At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, if you have a card named "Forbidden Library" in your memory, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose one of your other 《Magic》 or 《Weapon》 characters and this card, exchange them as 【STAND】, and this card getes +1000 power until end of turn.

Name: Silver-Haired Beauty, Emilia
Text: 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card attacks, if a card named "Starting Life in Another World" is in your climax area, and the number of other 《Magic》 or 《Weapon》 characters you have is three or more, look at up to four cards from the top of your deck, choose up to one 《Magic》 or 《Weapon》 character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, put the rest into your waiting room, and this card gets +1000 power until end of turn.

Name: Blue-Haired Maid, Rem
Text: 【CONT】 If the number of climax in your waiting room is two or less, this card gets -1 level while in your hand.
【CONT】 This card gets +1000 power for each marker underneath this card.
【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room.
【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may choose a 《Magic》 or 《Weapon》 character in your waiting room, and put it face down underneath this card as a marker.

Name: Subaru Natsuki
Text: 【CONT】 Great Performance

【AUTO】 Memory At the beginning of your climax phase, if a card named "Subaru Natsuki" is in your memory, choose one of your 《Magic》 or 《Weapon》 characters, and that character gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card attacks, you may deal one damage to your opponent." (This damage may be canceled)

【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 Memory [(7) Put four cards and a card named "Like A Demon" from your hand into your waiting room & Put this card into your memory] At the beginning of the encore step, if you have a card named "Return by Death" in your memory, and this card is 【REVERSE】, you may pay the cost. If you do, put all cards from your clock into your waiting room, all players return all their characters to their hand, and return all cards in their waiting room to their deck. Search your deck afterwards for up to one card named "Subaru Natsuki", put it on the stage position that this card was on, and all players shuffle their decks.

Name: Spirit User, Emilia
Text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room.

【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When a card named "Speaking to the Spirit" is placed on your climax area, if this card is on your center stage, and all of your characters are 《Magic》 or 《Weapon》, search your deck for up to one 《Magic》 or 《Weapon》 character, reveal it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterwards, and this card gets +2500 power until the end of your opponent's next turn.

Name: A Short Snooze, Emilia
Text: 【AUTO】 When a climax is placed on your climax area, choose one of your characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.
【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 this card] Flip over four cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, draw up to one card.

Name: Light of Love, Rem
Text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, draw up to two cards, choose a card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room.

【AUTO】 [(1) Put a card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, put the top five cards of your deck into your waiting room, and deal X damage to your opponent. X is equal to the number of climax revealed among those cards. (This damage may be canceled)

Name: Declaration of War, Felt
Text: 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, you may put the top card of your deck into your waiting room. If that card is a 《Magic》 or 《Weapon》 character, you may move this card to an open position of your center stage.

Name: Roswaal Mansion Maid, Ram
Text: 【CONT】 If all of your characters have "Roswaal(ロズワール)" or "Ram(ラム)" or "Rem(レム)" in its card name, this card gets +1000 power.

【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [(1)] When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if a card named "As the Older Sister" is in your climax area, and all of your characters have "Roswaal(ロズワール)" or "Ram(ラム)" or "Rem(レム)" in its card name, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose up to two characters in your waiting room with "Roswaal(ロズワール)" or "Ram(ラム)" or "Rem(レム)" in its card name, and return them to your hand.

Name: Sunset Knoll, Beatrice
Text: 【CONT】 During your turn, this card gets +1000 power.
【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is level 1 or lower, you may 【REVERSE】 that character.

Name: Peaceful Life, Rem
Text: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put the top card of your deck into your clock] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to one level 1 or lower character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
【AUTO】 When this card attacks, you may put the top card of your deck into your waiting room. If that card is a climax, draw a card, choose a card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room.

Name: Half-Elf Maiden, Emilia
Text: 【CONT】 If the number of other 《Magic》 or 《Weapon》 characters you have is three or more, this card gets +1500 power and the following ability. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may put that character into your opponent's memory."

【AUTO】 [(2) Put a card from your hand into your waiting room & Put another character from your stage into your waiting room] This ability activates up to one time per turn. During the turn that this card was placed on the stage from your hand,when this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a card named "Great Spirit, Puck" in your waiting room, and put it on any position of your stage.

Name: Modest Request, Rem
Text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card with "Ram(ラム)" or "Rem(レム)" or "Subaru(スバル)" in its card name get +2000 power and the following ability. "【CONT】 This card cannot be chosen by your opponent's effects."

【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand or by the 【AUTO】 effect of a card named "Demon's Demeanor, Rem", draw up to two cards, choose two cards in your hand, put them into your waiting room, and put up to one card from the top of your deck into your stock.

【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [Put a character from your hand into your waiting room & Put a card named "Oni's Smile" from your climax area into your waiting room] At the end of your turn, you may pay the cost. If you do, return the top card of your clock to your hand.

Name: Bride in Pure White, Rem
Text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose one of your 《Magic》 or 《Weapon》 characters, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn.

【AUTO】 When this card attacks, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a 《Magic》 or 《Weapon》 character, put it into your hand, choose a card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room. (If it is not, return the revealed card to its original position)

Name: Lap Pillow Emilia
Text: 【CONT】 If the number of other 《Magic》 or 《Weapon》 characters you have is three or more, this card gets +2000 power.
【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if a blue climax is in your climax area, draw a card, choose a card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room.
Flavor Text: Don't be so explicit! It's embarrassing! Also, don't look this way!

Name: Welcome to This World! Emilia & Rem
Text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +1000 power.
【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose one of your characters, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn.
